data.name: Reknum Fantasy of Dreams
data.detailed_description:
REKNUM Fantasy of Dreams is an action, exploration and 2D platformer videogame, it is the latest installment in the REKNUM saga in which Cheri awakens from a fantasy to start the real adventure! Explore the thematic levels, unlock new weapons and upgrade your skills, fight fearsome bosses inspired by classic gameplay, decipher the poetic words of the ancestors when you travel through the dreamworld and reach the real final outcome.

What would you do to mend the past? Is facing your fears the solution to become stronger?… or perhaps the key to making amends? change or protect the future, what would you do to make up for an injury done to a loved one?… Let’s look for answers in this classic platform adventure full of challenges, puzzles, combats and more!

Explore the thematic levels in their different routes, unlock new weapons and upgrade your skills, decipher the poetic words of the ancestors to find your meaning of existence while restoring order to the kingdom, fight fearsome bosses inspired by classic gameplay, travel through the dreamworld and reach the real final outcome.

As long as the Kingdom of Reknum has existed there have been legends of a powerful secret hidden within that land. The myths speak of Sacred Crystals, rich in power, but unable to be claimed by any who were not deemed worthy. For only someone who had a soul as pure as driven snow, with wisdom and courage to match, would be able to lay claim to that power.


Reknum is a beautiful realm, filled with towering mountains, wide forests, and deep oceans teaming with life and magic. Its rulers have long been just and fair, and peace has reigned for many a year…until the betrayal of the Sorceress.


Just where the Sorceress came from none can say, but she soon had the ear of Reknum rulers, advising them in matters of magic and statecraft. She was soon indispensable, and that is when she struck. Capturing the Princess, and imprisoning her in a Soul Shard, the Sorceress seeks to use that fair lady’s essence to gain the power of the Sacred Crystals for herself, and use it to rule the world.


The Princess, is a last ditch hope, was able to send her friend, Vani the Fairy, in search of a soul full enough of courage to come to her rescue. She barely managed it before she was locked away, but Vani was soon soaring across the skies, searching for a savior.


Our brave heroine has been found by Vani, and is only just now awakening. This is where our legend begins.

data.short_description: Is facing your fears the solution to become stronger?… or perhaps the key to making amends? change or protect the future, what would you do to make up for an injury done to a loved one?… Let’s look for answers in this classic platform adventure full of challenges, puzzles, combats and more!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Quad @ 2.8 GHz or AMD Phenom X4
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD 7770 or Nvidia GeForce GTX 550 Ti
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 @ 3.3 GHz or AMD Phenom II X6
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD 7770 or Nvidia GeForce GTX 550 Ti
  • Storage: 15 GB available space

data.legal_notice: "Reknum Fantasy of Dreams", "NAPE GAMES" are registered trademarks or trademarks of NAPE GAMES S.L.
